list_definition.definition: a portion of ice-cream served with fruit, syrup etc

list_ex_of_english: Similarly, birthday guests are offered a free mini-dessert sundae to accompany their meal.
Carl's sells only three flavors (vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry), but also offers sundaes, shakes, malts, frozen slushes and slush floats.
Unusual offerings include a glass of soda water for 2 cents, and the traditional free sundae for customers celebrating a birthday.
Several men claimed to have created the first sundae, but there is no conclusive evidence to support any of their stories.
Now there's no room to breathe, and he can't even have a go at his skateboard ramp or the sundae buffet.
Daisy loves sunflower sundaes, riding her unicycle, has a large leaf collection and loves peppermint tea.
It's lightweight fun, the gaming equivalent of a strawberry sundae.
Some of the sundaes are huge and intended for a group to share.
